description: Detects the load of a signed and vulnerable GIGABYTE driver often used by threat actors or malware for privilege escalation
name: Vulnerable GIGABYTE Driver Load
query: (winlog.event_data.Hashes:(*MD5\=9AB9F3B75A2EB87FAFB1B7361BE9DFB3* OR *SHA1\=FE10018AF723986DB50701C8532DF5ED98B17C39* OR *SHA256\=31F4CFB4C71DA44120752721103A16512444C13C2AC2D857A7E6F13CB679B427*) OR MD5:"9ab9f3b75a2eb87fafb1b7361be9dfb3" OR SHA1:"fe10018af723986db50701c8532df5ed98b17c39" OR SHA256:"31f4cfb4c71da44120752721103a16512444c13c2ac2d857a7e6f13cb679b427")
author: Florian Roth
